markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Invisible Chain Shirt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1063)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 186 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 2,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [invisibility](/Equipment.aspx?ID=287) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_ is itself invisible. Other creatures can't see it at all, allowing you to wear it surreptitiously. Additionally, the armor's invisible composition is quieter and more comfortable than a normal chain shirt. It loses the [noisy](/Traits.aspx?ID=205) trait and gains the [comfort](/Traits.aspx?ID=203) trait.

<document level="2" id="action-852" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Invisible Chain Shirt

text: <title level="1" right="Item 13" pfs="Standard" > Invisible Chain Shirt Source Secrets of Magic pg. 186 1.1 Price 2,750 gp Usage worn armor Bulk 1 Base Armor Chain Shirt --- This +2 resilient invisibility chain shirt is itself invisible. Other creatures can't see it at all, allowing you to wear it surreptitiously. Additionally, the armor's invisible composition is quieter and more comfortable than a normal chain shirt. It loses the noisy trait and gains the comfort trait.
